name: CoalCoin
goal: At the moment there is no single open market for the coal sector. Lack of information, corruption, outdated legislation, unfair intermediation in the coal market - all this hampers effective interaction between the supplier and the consumer. To restore this essential relationship, our team creates the first decentralized market for coal fuel and its cryptoactive - CoalCoin. Ecosystem CoalCoin allows in 2 clicks to find coal of the right brand from the nearest supplier, make a deal and carry out logistics.
interests: Communication, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Energy Union strategy, EU energy and climate strategy till 2030;
Clean Energy for All Europeans Package
Electricity market design and relates issues;
bilateral EU-Ukraine energy cooperation and support on energy reforms in Ukraine;
Energy Community activities;
Revision of the directives on security of supply on gas and electricity;
Energy efficiency (whole range of issues);
Climate and ETS reform;
Renewable energy regulation and integration into the market;
integration of the Ukrainian energy system into the European market
